Dear Ms. Norman:
Attached is the Original Licensing Study Report for the above referenced facility. The
study has determined substantial compliance with applicable licensing statutes and
administrative rules. Therefore, a provisional license is issued.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact Gregory Corrigan, Area Manager at (269) 337-5066.
Sincerely,
Kathy Fiorletta, Licensing Consultant

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
Wellspring Lutheran Services of Lansing is located at 411 West Lake Lansing Rd. East
Lansing, MI 48823. The physical location of this agency is on a bus route making it
easier for families to get to the agency. The agency offers a large waiting room and two
conference rooms for trainings and meetings. There are two visitation rooms for
families and office space for staff. This office was previously used as a satellite office to
the Wellspring Grand Rapids Branch, but is seeking to obtain its own license. The
office and location was clean and appropriate for the clients served.
B. Program Description
Wellspring Lutheran Services is a private nonprofit child placing agency providing foster
care services to children and families in the child welfare system. Currently Wellspring
is staffed with four foster care case managers, a foster care supervisor, two licensing
workers and a licensing supervisor. There are two program managers, one for the
licensing department and the other for the foster care department and a division
director. Wellspring is currently services 53 children in care.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
Wellspring is currently in compliance with all applicable licensing rules, policy and MSA
requirements.
2

IV. RECOMMENDATION
I recommend Wellspring Lutheran Services Lansing be issued an original
provisional licensee for this child placing agency, private.
Kathy Fiorletta Date 03/19/15
Licensing Consultant

03/23/2015
Gregory V. Corrigan Date
